adjustCalorieHint: You need to {action} your daily intake from {currentCalories} kcal to ≈ {adjustedCalories} kcal to reach your desired weight.
warningMessage: ⚠️ Warning: Your calculated caloric intake is {consumptionLevel} and may be harmful. Please consider adjusting your target weight or increasing your time frame.
invalidTargetWeight: Target weight must be between {weightMin} {weightUnit} and {weightMax} {weightUnit}.
invalidTimeFrame: Time frame must be between 14 and 365 days.
invalidCalorieIntake: Calorie intake must be between 800 and 8000 kcal.
invalidAge: Age must be between 10 and 120 years.

calculateAccuracyTooltip.title: The Mifflin-St. George formula
calculateAccuracyTooltip.description: The Mifflin-St. George formula is used to calculate the daily calorie requirement. It estimates your daily calorie needs with a 10% margin of error. A 10% margin of error means that the calculated {adjustedCaloricIntake} kcal your body needs can range from {lowerLimit} to {upperLimit} kcal per day.

activityTooltip.sedentary: Sedentary: Office or desk job, watching TV or using a computer for most of the day
activityTooltip.light: Light: Light exercise or sports 1 to 3 days per week, light household chores
activityTooltip.moderate: Moderate: Moderate exercise or sports 3 to 5 days per week
activityTooltip.active: Active: Hard exercise or sports 6 to 7 days per week, physically demanding jobs like construction or farming
activityTooltip.veryActive: Very Active: Very hard exercise/sports and a physically demanding job or training twice a day
